calendar.description: Senate Natural Resources, Agriculture, and Environment Hearing
Senate Natural Resources, Agriculture, and Environment Hearing
House Natural Resources, Agriculture, and Environment Hearing

general_provisions: This bill creates requirements for providing electrical service to large-scale electrical loads.
hilighted_provisions: This bill:<hr><ltbullet>defines terms;<hr><ltbullet>establishes alternative processes for providing electric service to customers with large electrical loads;<hr><ltbullet>exempts service provided under this chapter from certain rate regulation requirements while maintaining safety and reliability standards;<hr><ltbullet>creates procedures for submitting, evaluating, and contracting for large-scale electrical service requests;<hr><ltbullet>establishes requirements for qualified electric utilities and large-scale generation providers serving large load customers;<hr><ltbullet>creates accounting and operational transparency requirements to protect retail customers;<hr><ltbullet>establishes a framework for closed private generation systems and connected generation systems;<hr><ltbullet>requires the Public Service Commission (commission) to investigate the feasibility of a large load flexible tariff; and<hr><ltbullet>requires the commission to conduct periodic reviews of the program and report to the Legislature.
